thread.title: Obama administration designates 2 new marine sanctuaries
thread.title_full: Obama administration designates 2 new marine sanctuaries

title: Obama administration designates 2 new marine sanctuaries
text: Obama administration designates 2 new marine sanctuaries The White House is announcing the designation of two new National Marine Sanctuaries - the first chosen in 15 years - as part of President Barack Obama's efforts to protect the environment. More >> The White House is announcing the designation of two new National Marine Sanctuaries - the first chosen in 15 years - as part of President Barack Obama's efforts to protect the environment.
